      • processMove

        public java.lang.String processMove(GameGrid grid,
                                    int i,
                                    int j)
        Method returns warning message to HumanPlayer, which is shown through GUI, if player clicks the GUI when it is computer player's turn.
        Specified by:
        processMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        grid, - current gamestate
        i, - row of clicked cell
        j, - column of clicked cell
        Returns:
        String representing warning message

      • nextMove

        public void nextMove(GameGrid grid)
        Method requests the gamegrid for a list of all valid moves. It then randomly picks a move from the list. The method runs in a separate thread to not slow down the UI of the game.
        Specified by:
        nextMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        grid, - current gamestate
